resource.description: The AWS::AutoScaling::ScheduledAction resource specifies an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling scheduled action so that the Auto Scaling group can change the number of instances available for your application in response to predictable load changes.

properties.name: AutoScalingGroupName
properties.description: The name of the Auto Scaling group.

type.description: The name of the Auto Scaling group.

properties.name: DesiredCapacity
properties.description: The desired capacity is the initial capacity of the Auto Scaling group after the scheduled action runs and the capacity it attempts to maintain.

type.description: The desired capacity is the initial capacity of the Auto Scaling group after the scheduled action runs and the capacity it attempts to maintain.

properties.name: EndTime
properties.description: The latest scheduled start time to return. If scheduled action names are provided, this parameter is ignored.

type.description: The latest scheduled start time to return. If scheduled action names are provided, this parameter is ignored.

properties.name: MaxSize
properties.description: The minimum size of the Auto Scaling group.

type.description: The minimum size of the Auto Scaling group.

properties.name: MinSize
properties.description: The minimum size of the Auto Scaling group.

type.description: The minimum size of the Auto Scaling group.

properties.name: Recurrence
properties.description: The recurring schedule for the action, in Unix cron syntax format. When StartTime and EndTime are specified with Recurrence , they form the boundaries of when the recurring action starts and stops.

type.description: The recurring schedule for the action, in Unix cron syntax format. When StartTime and EndTime are specified with Recurrence , they form the boundaries of when the recurring action starts and stops.

properties.name: StartTime
properties.description: The earliest scheduled start time to return. If scheduled action names are provided, this parameter is ignored.

type.description: The earliest scheduled start time to return. If scheduled action names are provided, this parameter is ignored.

properties.name: TimeZone
properties.description: The time zone for the cron expression.

type.description: The time zone for the cron expression.

attributes.description: The AWS::AutoScaling::ScheduledAction resource specifies an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling scheduled action so that the Auto Scaling group can change the number of instances available for your application in response to predictable load changes.
